text: Son Myung-soon (Hangul:손명순, Hanja:孫命順) (also transliterated as Sohn Myung Soon) (29 January 1929 – 7 March 2024) was a South Korean socialite. She was the widow of South Korean President Kim Young-sam. She was the first lady when Kim Young-sam was in office, from 1993 to 1998. Yonhap news agency, Seoul - March 10, 1997 BBC Son Myung-soon died on 7 March 2024 in Seoul, South Korea from COVID-19 at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:First Ladies of South Korea Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Son Myung-soon
